feed.title: Syncthing-Fork Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Syncthing-Fork: Syncthing-Fork v1.29.7.1
entry.content:
Checkpoint release - Use this if migrating from the deprecated "syncthing-android" to this app.

ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Problems upgrading from an older version than v1.29.7.1? ‚ÜóÔ∏è Please follow the steps: * Slide out the menu > Import and Export > Export config * Exit app * Uninstall app - if Android asks, do NOT keep data (this refers to app data, not your synced files) * (Re-)Install app using the latest release * Complete the welcome slides * Slide out the menu > Import and Export > Import config

If you still face problems, check out issue https://github.com/Catfriend1/syncthing-android/issues/4 .

entry.title: New release for Syncthing-Fork: Syncthing-Fork v1.29.7.2
entry.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è Breaking change: The config import and export feature now reads or writes the file "(InternalStorage)/backups/syncthing/config.zip". This file can be encrypted by a user-defined password to protect sensitive parts of your Syncthing configuration like, for example, device trust and which data you share with other devices. The change makes it harder for a bad actor to gain unauthorized access to your files using stolen config exports.

‚ÑπÔ∏è Action required: - Please go to "Settings - Import and Export" - Set an individual password, be sure to remember it - Click "Export Configuration" and confirm - Open your file manager, e.g. Material Files - Browse to "(InternalStorage)/backups/syncthing" - Delete all ".pem", ".xml" files because they contain an outdated and unencrypted config from prior exports.

Screenshot:

‚ö°If you'd like to import an old and unencrypted config consisting of multiple files instead of the zip archive, please follow these steps.

ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Problems upgrading? Please see release notes of v1.29.7.1 .

entry.title: New release for Syncthing-Fork: Syncthing-Fork v1.30.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixes

  • Fix crash referring to libsyncthingnative.so
  • Fix duplicate .nomedia and DO_NOT_DELETE.txt files created if folder is readded
  • Fix executorService crash while exiting the app is in progress

Other

  • Move wiki to repo folder /wiki, add actions builds for branch "fdroid"
  • F-Droid builds: Use correct go version from Dockerfile
  • Fix install_minimum_android_sdk_prerequisites.py
  • model/Folder: maxConcurrentWrites = 0
  • Update SyncthingNative to v1.30.0
